this is the actual game. It is online-only, and basically the installer is useless until May 15th :p

This is for people wanting to get the installers before launch :)

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7105821/Diablo_III_-_Retail_version

Full version
I call fake on takeone_84's version. 4GB? The installer alone is 7.6GB...

yes you can play alone, but you are still getting information from the server so its not your classical 'download the game, play singleplayer, dont give a damn about multiplayer since that doesnt work anyways'. since game is more like a mmo by structure, cracks are highly unlikely. i mean look at beta emulator - beta has been out there for quite awhile and its still shit... and beta is only hour and a half long. imagine how long it would take to make everything else. its essentially scripting the whole game and its mechanics from scratch by using games files.

this torrent is pretty much for those who are buying the game, but have low download speed from blizzard server.

im not saying that you should buy this, but expecting an early crack is silly.
this is waste of time...
this is waste of time... i will pay for this 'til it released

@tospeed1980 waste of time? Go download the installer at launch then, and then see how much of a waste of time this is :p

The purpose of acquiring this installer BEFORE release is to prepare yourself FOR the release (as in, you don't obviously want to download 7.6GB as soon as Diablo III comes out if your trying to play it ASAP, and chances are download servers will be overloaded at launch)
waste of time? not really but still i want to pay to Blizzards for Diablo III. Is this cracked or something get to play? Sorry I have bad english :)
oh this is playable online until it launch - i will download

This is only the installer, and isn't usable (to my knowledge) until May 15th. Even when May 15th arrives, the only way your playing Diablo III is if you pay for it. 

So you can still buy Diablo III, and download this, then come May 15th, you just run the installer, then patch it, then play :)

finally looking for this file. i ordered for the game collector's edition but won't get it for some time since i'm not from the USA. this way i could just get the cd key from my sister(who is in USA) and use it on this installer.
just wondering. on launch date how do you get this to work?
@Espionage724 now does this diablo provide online and single player, and how can this work battle net is a private server

No, there are no Cracks or Emulators that work with D3.
No private server, no access to Battle.net unless you actually buy a serial for it.

Everyone on YouTube is lying about having one, and most of the major crackers are not even looking into getting it working. What is really pathetic, is they will not even let their faithful fans know that they are not working on it.

So posting these things, and saying 'wait for a crack' is a scam. There may be an emulator eventually (6-12 months) but no time soon (unless YOU hack the Blizzard servers and get the other 2GB of assets they withheld). This is nothing more than a 8GB waste of time right now.

@raiden92

Nope, theres never gonna be a cracked coz its server sided like WoW, there aint gonna be even such thing as crack for this, the only way i know WoW and Diablo 3 is gonna be a private server emulator, but will prolly take a year or so to make from private individuals, but every installers i said above are corrupt except for this one, you can install this and buy a CD key and play, this installer is the legit retail one. all of the others are corrupted installers or cant even install expect this one.

I got tired of fake cracks and I looked for an alternative.

I found this http://www.drakensang.com/?&aid=3546&invID=xbdebbdbjdjxcdebjjijixbaajfecxibgxbgdhxbaa

It is a great game, and is free, even more, it can be played in a browser.

It cooled my thirst of killing monsters.
I played for a month with my old graphic card, and the refresh was kind of slow, and I decided to get a new card. I HAD A BIG SURPRISE. tHE GAME IT IS 3D. it has a great scenery, especially in north with those waterfalls or blizzards. I suppose that diablo is 3d too, since it has the same hardware requirements.

Anyway, drakensang is a very good alternative for diablo. Maybe is better. I will know in a year when diablo will be cracked.

I would liked to pay for diablo, blizard has done good job and deserve to be payed, I promised that after I played for free diablo 1 and two, I will pay for the third, but the price is not affordable for me. It matches my income for a month. I can afford to get hungry for a month reducing with a third my expenses, but I cannot afford to postpone my bills.
